optionsDescriptions.omnislibrary: The name of the Omnis library containing the form.
optionsDescriptions.omnisclass: The name of the Remote Form class to load.
optionsDescriptions.webserverurl: (Optional) The URL to the Omnis web server plugin. Leave empty/omit to connect directly to the local Omnis instance.
optionsDescriptions.omnisserverandport: (Optional) $serverport/<ipaddress>:$serverport of Omnis server. Leave empty if using a direct connection.
optionsDescriptions.serverport: Omnis' $serverport. If set to zero, assumes the serverport is the web socket port -1 (the default)
